description: The os-quota-sets extension omits a serializer for the "defaults" call, meaning that XML results from this call will be incorrect.
title: Missing serializer on os-quota-sets/defaults

comments.content: The os-quota-sets extension omits a serializer for the "defaults" call, meaning that XML results from this call will be incorrect.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~klmitch
